channel.title: [project insanity] [mysql] need help fixing auth connection error etc
channel.description:
dont know how to do it got so far but when u do ::auth in game
[SPOILER=Errors]java.lang.Exception: connection is null at server.Database.getConnection(Database.java:48) at server.model.players.packets.Commands.playerCommands(Commands.java:662) at server.model.players.packets.Commands.processPacket(Commands.java:32) at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:136) at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1047) at server.core.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:191) at server.Server$2.execute(Server.java:148) at server.core.GameEngine$1.run(GameEngine.java:103) at server.core.GameEngine$5.run(GameEngine.java:176) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$201(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/SPOILER]
these errors pop up on eclipse some one help please
skype ryan.sheps
i have team viewer!
